CustomField.formula: Text( HOT_WorkOrderLineItem__r.HOT_NumberOfInterpreters__c ) + LEFT(HOT_WorkTypeName__c , FIND(' - ', HOT_WorkTypeName__c )) + IF( HOT_Request__r.IsSerieoppdrag__c, ', SO' + Text( HOT_Request__r.NumberOfWorkOrders__c ), '') + ' - ' + IF( HOT_IsScreenInterpreterNew__c , 'Skjermtolk', Street) + IF(City != "", ', ' + City, "")
CustomField.label: Information
